verses.verse: When <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> <S%H1696>spoke,<s%> there was <S%H7578>trembling.<s%> He <S%H5375>exalted<s%> himself in <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> but when he became <S%H816>guilty<s%> in <S%H1168>Baal,<s%> he <S%H4191>died.<s%>

Now they <S%H2398>sin<s%> <S%H3254>more<s%> and <S%H3254>more,<s%> and have <S%H6213>made<s%> themselves molten <S%H4541>images<s%> of their <S%H3701>silver,<s%> even <S%H6091>idols<s%> according to their own <S%H8394>understanding,<s%> all of them the <S%H4639>work<s%> of the <S%H2796>craftsmen.<s%> They <S%H559>say<s%> of <S%H2076>them,<s%> 'They offer human sacrifice and <S%H5401>kiss<s%> the <S%H5695>calves.<s%>'

Therefore they will be like the <S%H1242>morning<s%> <S%H6051>mist,<s%> and like the <S%H2919>dew<s%> that passes <S%H1980>away<s%> <S%H7925>early,<s%> like the <S%H4671>chaff<s%> that is driven with the <S%H5590>whirlwind<s%> out of the threshing <S%H1637>floor,<s%> and like the <S%H6227>smoke<s%> out of the <S%H699>chimney.<s%>

"Yet I am <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> from the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> and you shall <S%H3045>acknowledge<s%> no <S%H430>god<s%> but <S%H2108>me,<s%> and besides <S%H1115>me<s%> there is no <S%H3467>savior.<s%>
I <S%H3045>knew<s%> you in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of great <S%H8514>drought.<s%>

According to their <S%H4830>pasture,<s%> so were they <S%H7646>filled;<s%> they were <S%H7646>filled,<s%> and their <S%H3820>heart<s%> was <S%H7311>exalted.<s%> Therefore they have forgotten <S%H7911>me.<s%>
Therefore I am like a <S%H7826>lion<s%> to <S%H5246>them.<s%> Like a leopard, I will <S%H7789>lurk<s%> by the <S%H1870>path.<s%>

I will <S%H6298>meet<s%> them like a <S%H1677>bear<s%> that is <S%H7909>bereaved<s%> of her <S%H7167>cubs,<s%> and will tear the <S%H5458>covering<s%> of their <S%H3820>heart.<s%> There I will <S%H398>devour<s%> them like a <S%H3833>lioness.<s%> The <S%H7704>wild<s%> <S%H2416>animal<s%> will tear <S%H1234>them.<s%>
You are <S%H7843>destroyed,<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> because you are against <S%H5828>me,<s%> against your help.

<S%H645>Where<s%> is your <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H165>now,<s%> that he may <S%H3467>save<s%> you in all your <S%H5892>cities?<s%> And your <S%H8199>judges,<s%> of whom you <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H5414><s%> 'Give me a <S%H4428>king<s%> and <S%H8269>princes?<s%>'
I have <S%H5414>given<s%> you a <S%H4428>king<s%> in my <S%H639>anger,<s%> and have <S%H3947>taken<s%> him away in my <S%H5678>wrath.<s%>
The <S%H5771>guilt<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> is stored <S%H6887>up.<s%> His <S%H2403>sin<s%> is stored <S%H6887>up.<s%>

The <S%H2256>sorrows<s%> of a travailing <S%H3205>woman<s%> will <S%H935>come<s%> on <S%H2450>him.<s%> He is an unwise <S%H1121>son;<s%> for when it is <S%H6256>time,<s%> he <S%H5975>doesn't<s%> come to the <S%H4866>opening<s%> of the <S%H1121>womb.<s%>

I will <S%H6299>ransom<s%> them from the <S%H3027>power<s%> of <S%H7585>Sheol.<s%> I will <S%H1350>redeem<s%> them from <S%H4194>death!<s%> <S%H4194>Death,<s%> where are your <S%H1698>plagues?<s%> <S%H7585>Sheol,<s%> where <S%H165>is<s%> your <S%H6987>destruction?<s%> <S%H5164>"Compassion<s%> <S%H165>will<s%> be <S%H5641>hidden<s%> from my <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>

Though he is <S%H6500>fruitful<s%> among his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> an east <S%H6921>wind<s%> will <S%H935>come,<s%> the <S%H7307>breath<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> coming <S%H5927>up<s%> from the <S%H4057>wilderness;<s%> and his <S%H4726>spring<s%> will become <S%H954>dry,<s%> and his <S%H4599>fountain<s%> will be dried <S%H2717>up.<s%> He will <S%H8154>plunder<s%> the <S%H3627>storehouse<s%> <S%H2532>of<s%> <S%H214>treasure.<s%>

<S%H8111>Samaria<s%> will bear her <S%H816>guilt;<s%> for she has <S%H4784>rebelled<s%> against her <S%H430>God.<s%> They will <S%H5307>fall<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword.<s%> Their <S%H5768>infants<s%> will be dashed in <S%H7376>pieces,<s%> and their <S%H2030>pregnant<s%> women will be ripped <S%H1234>open.<s%>"
